# iru_custom_profile (List Resource)

Lists Kandji Custom Profile resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Query existing iru_custom_profile resources
list "iru_custom_profile" "all" {
  provider         = iru
  include_resource = true
  limit            = 100
}

# Use the queried results for bulk import into managed resources
/*
import {
  for_each = list.iru_custom_profile.all
  to       = iru_custom_profile.managed[each.key]
  id       = each.value.id
}

resource "iru_custom_profile" "managed" {
  for_each = list.iru_custom_profile.all
}
*/
```
